bow: things you can not say in front of my toddler without inciting riot hubby just sent me an angry text because said the word pancake in front of our year old as he was headed out the door this morning she cried all the way to daycare for pancake she had her morning snack and breakfast at daycare was in half hour other words you ca say in her presence waffle applesauce chips outside backyard what your list pocahontas you mention the word pocahontas and you will be listening to just around the riverbend on repeat for your entire car ride apparently colors of wind and the rest of the soundtrack do count as pocahontas music outside dessert breakfast basketball birthday and applesauce she can be pretty dramatic ugh not something you say but along the same lines my parents got my year old milkshake at sonic one day when they were watching him and now we ca drive by one without huge screaming fit for milkcake we have to drive by at least of them to get anywhere the grandparents think it hilarious ll remember that when picking their nursing home milk cookie tractor incites nonstop youtube requests displaying ipad see tractor outside backyard park wagon and tool camping park playground beach or trains oh man that was my least favorite song in the movie sorry would freak if my hubby got pissed because said the wrong word the toddlers reaction was wrong not you for saying word never tolerated tantrums though if you threw hissy fit you were getting what you wanted for quite while so my kids learned quick my nephew freaks out if you say outside or store or even phineus and ferb not saying you guys are doing anything wrong just had very different approach so this was none issue in my house and will be none issue for baby good luck well bless your heart note because kids get fixated on something and then get upset over it does not mean parents are tolerating tantrums or giving in but thanks for playing my son tends to get fixated on stuff and go on about it for an hour or more at time there no specific thing that sets him off or gets him upset but recently made the mistake of telling him we were going to see the horses on the way to big event told him 20 minutes into the hour drive oops see horses now see horses horses logan want see horses usually construction equipment serves as good driving distraction but even excavators and dump trucks did not divert him it not usually tantrumy or upset but he can be awfully hard to derail other things that have caused this doggie excavator elmo tractor bicycle motorcycle and carporter car transport truck lightning mcqueen cookies sweets surfing nana house with you my son gets really excited when he hears certain words but we just tell him not right now and redirect he does throw tantrums sometimes but they rarely last more than minute exactly the approach used and rarely get any sort of fuss from them anymore just always hated the idea of censoring myself of everyday mundane vocab to prevent fight think the worst get now is the five year old will except no but ask again when an appropriate amount of time has passed can play tablet not right now one hour later can play tablet now and if say not today he gets up at the crack of dawn the next day to ask first thing lol not really riot but endless asking and begging if even mention his pal in passing it can we go to house please mommy it good idea it really adorable how much he loves his friend but also heart breaking when he really misses his pal we were really close with another family last year but they has to move to germany military and for months he was asking where his friend went it was so sad to hear him ask mommy want to play with but is really far away it been months and he still and on occasion feel for you but that made me giggle my brother used to do that with the vacuum mom could go near the closet it was kept say the word vacuum or offhandedly mention that the floors were dirty without inciting full on stampede to the closet to ride the silly thing outside pizza nana papa blueberry or strawberry yesterday my husband told our son we were going to get pizza after we were done signing the paperwork for our new car just as we sat down to sign hubby thought it would encourage our son to sit nicely until we were done bless his heart it almost caused meltdown as had to jump up and keep him from running out of the office in his excitement we did manage to avoid the meltdown thank goodness but sure my immediate reaction was to shoot my husband dirty look and tell him he should have said that yet there nothing worse than the exact moment when ll say word or some trigger before long journey and immediately regret uttering it little guy will latch on and start repeating asking or just obsessing over it forever bagel boardwalk cake ice cream park or the name of any kid she knows for our five year old skylanders he immediately begs to play or if we see something at the store he simply wants to buy everything we ll typically say ylanders skay pig latin woo hoo if we need to talk about something without him catching on when we drive by sonic it ice ice ice our year old freaking loves to eat their ice just spit my tea imaging this scene thanks for the laugh or you just buy really loud annoying toys that are just for grandma and grandpa house ipad and cookie my niece are currently popcorn swing babies puppies and watch which has her running to her movie drawer the vacuum cleaner is the only thing that has inspired public near tantrum for mine no would not get him all the vacuums at target about the only time crying upset child has made onlookers laugh vacuuuuuum one lady looked at me and asked if he could come over to her house outside shoes because that means we are going somewhere let me help the kid is set on doing everything by himself have fifteen month old but bottle diaper chips icecream espcially since she ca have dairy products or nap she has also started totally flipping her shit when she notices that we are pulling into the parking lot of her pediatrician office omg this every time open the laptop hear skeeeming goats she wants to youtube music videos with screaming goats cut into them how have not heard of this just watched taylor swift with screaming goat can not imagine having to watch more over and over again my heart bleeds for you the first time its hilarious second time is meh third time kind of wanted to die before the repitition killed my joy the taylor swift one was one of my favorites and if you did see them check out the bon jovi and queen goat remixes her other favorite is kitty in box which is some dude somewhere in asia that films his cat fitting into different sized boxes not even sure how that one happened but can tell you never give your kid the steering wheel on youtube cute kitties turns into giant pussy with two dicks within clicks omg so true about youtube the thumbnails are not even safe papa tractor ice cream treat mow drive omg using pig latin for skylanders from this moment on think you have saved me from loosing my mind lol my first reaction was how does what your list become toddler buzzword think she was just relating funny story not asking for advice right now for us it just hummus and outside sure that list will grow just as fast as my lo if not faster clever boy haha had this today got to daycare said to my son is thomas still in your cubby did know my wife picked it up yesterday he was bawling wreck when dropped him off want thomas sigh fml peanut butter and jelly if never ever see that fucking dancing banana again it will be too soon we have place called puppy zone here which is pet store with an open floor plan and puppies in cribs that have been converted into open topped dog crates you can just walk around and snuggle ridiculously overpriced puppies with no temptation to buy one because they re like 800 mentioned it to my year old niece once and we decided we would go after lunch at restaurant the rest of the meal was her mom and the rest of us trying to catch up while an over excited toddler alternated between muttering puppies puppies to herself and squealing cheerios goldfish penguins store brand version of goldfish yogurt outside shoes mean we re going outside also opening the snack cupboard incites cries of hungry hungry fury there are ton more ve gotten similar angry messages for saying the wrong thing at the wrong time jake captain hook grandma grandpa uncle bobby uncle joe or tractor ride always feel bad about the grandma grandpa uncle bobby uncle joe part because we live so far away from all of them it always takes few minutes to redirect or else he gets angry when he ca go see them right now when we do go up we have to watch where we say we are going so we do have whole car ride about see grandpa now grandpa tractor while it adorable it makes me sad all credit goes to my brilliant partner it was his idea we re already bilingual household so it not difficult for us to throw ylanders skay into our conversation without my son picking up on it but it been lifesaver when we ve been out shopping for back to school stuff amp birthday gifts hey babe you see that ylanders skay backpack yeah but it seems bit big maybe next year chocolate and bottle ca say ipad or fynn his little friend across the street outside wow all our kids reeeeally want to get out of the house juice dinner we do utter the word unless it is ready to be eaten or there is meltdown madness george for curious george or pig for peppa pig because if we are at home to put an episode on we may as well not continue living ah the joys bug even if you mean it in the emotional sense you better produce said bug or there will be debate about it non existence in the moment she three and her favorite thing is digging in the yard in her light up cinderella dress up shoes baybeee lol my husband just downloaded baby game on his ipad for our month old he thinks it adorable watching him play it counting down to few months from now when husband is no longer able to play plants vs zombies without being divebombed by screaming toddler non issue not none issue do make me throw an improper usage tantrum ha just recently showed my year old video of maru aka the kitty in box now whenever he sees our tablet hear mama you watch kitties with me he ignores our actual cat but internet kitty is his jam and adults fixate and get upset too it just that we can give ourselves whatever we want and use complex reasoning to deny ourselves things both things that toddlers ca do it not horrible behavior that needs to be stamped out with big black boot discouraged yes but never tolerated do know if have the energy to be that strict this is my story lol my lil girl loves popsicles we open the freezer and she ll start screaming popicle as soon as she finishes one popicle oh and balls she calls trixs cereal balls haha ca help but laugh at her our biggest one is costco she seriously loves going there if you say it you got ta go at least we usually go once week this is what do with keywords and it probably wo last but give my 21 month old semi ridiculous reasons when she being demanding example we ve had ice cream at costco before now every time we go to one she asks for ice cream so tell her that we can only have ice cream at costco when mommy stands in line for the ice cream as am currently not standing in line then thus we ca get ice cream do lie like tell her they re all out of ice cream today but will give reasons that sounds reasonable if you are lt hope this works for long time play play=ipad oy do mention family member visits until they re minutes away grandparents aunties uncles and cousins have to just appear or she asks for them until they *finally* arrive mickey if she hears his name she wants to see him we use pig latin all the time in our house or spell things out but our year old will be reading soon so do know how long that will work anything like do you want to go play to my oldest son when my year old is about to be put to bed outside any junk food that they ve heard of donut oh dear god if you say donut my year old is going to throw fit for them also if browsing the radio and anything mumford and sons or that stupid safe and sound song the poppy one not taylor swift comes on we re going to listen to it come hell or high water snacks she automatically cries for fruit snacks ha ca say grandad without the exact same thing tractor grandad tractor lawn mower grandad tractor please the ice at sonic is awesome just no cookie manny because handy manny monkies elmo birds because angry birds which he became so addicted to that we had to delete them from all electronic devices dora so is it bad out 3yr old has deciphered pig latin already deleted weetbix yoghurt sultanas outside hat because it insinuates we ate going outside blanket car draw texta crayon pen tiana her friend name and milk that what comes to mind right away say any of those words and you better get her that thing juice lunch milk grandma bye bye outside inside shoes wreck it for wreck it ralph tv raffi duck zoo train choo choo chocolate tv samuel soon to be born brother name dana my sil eta swimming ever forget security pillow blanket it hell tell you hell juice do even just shhhh that why have of them oh that is smart thinking outside is the big one at our house rain hail or shine he loves being outside also kitty car banana dummy nanna papa mail he loves to get the mail luckily for us if he is tired and you suggest bed he makes beeline for it our four year old goes ape over legoland if she sees single block of lego or any other building block type toy it have to go to legoland for the next hours have to go to legoland with insert name of each and every one of her friends then repeat every time *think* ve got that last lego block hidden in the box of blocks tucked away in the deepest darkest corner of the coat closet nope she miraculously finds one gt lt swear she knows where hiding them and just grabs some when not looking other words pancake auntie kim uncle steve she thinks he the steve from blues clues gramma cowpie grampa strawberry ipad car he has motorized car racetrack hot wheels racetrack pinky his stuffed bear that prefer he leaves home instead of bring it to daycare you can not say outside she will cry to go outside but we go out all the time fireworks she will beg to listen to katy perry fireworks mcdonalds she cries because she does get to go there used to show my daughter cute photos from aww but now she cries and demands show her kitty photos found on the baby animal site park down the block and walk have to do that with my dog and the vet every trip means we take slightly different route or else it complaining the whole way speaking of long drives used to help my daughter practice counting when we were stuck in traffic by using trees cars etc the problem is when she gets to however many she can count after that she says how many now mommy how many how many is that mommy mommmmmyyyyy how mannnnyyyy as long as she learning to count this problem will continue thought about this but the doctor office is in the middle of nowhere so would have to park on the interstate swimming swimming suit treat any of his favorite foods pizza taco pancake ice cream shower is one we absolutely can not say unless we plan to have one with him in it nanny or granddad outside vitamin shoes dinner or lunch unless it is ready and ca go to sonic with him or else he demands ice cream currently it halloween granny and ice cream we re always supercareful not to tell our son anything until we re about to go out the door we ve learned that if we tell him is going to happen on day and then for whatever reason it does happen all hell will break loose recently borrowed copy on cd of bill cosby himself from our library and made the mistake of listening to it in the car with my son listened to tracks amp every single day at least twice day for two solid weeks we use ferb latin in our house bubba who is likes to spell things out and sometimes have to sit there and think minute before realize what being spelled where is my from son quit spelling things have had coffee yet and my brain is awake enough to decipher what you just asked for elmo ugh she just loses it we never had words we could not say in front of our kids they threw tantrums about all kinds of dumb stuff like toddlers do but it was never like that do worry she ll grow out of it it gets easier no oh my god she not even year and half and she will lose her shit if she does get what she wants we ve resorted to rephrasing our no answers so they do really sound like we re saying no get what mean bath he has bath every night before bedtime but *god forbid* mention it any sooner than the actual second start to draw the water ca even pick up new change of clothes for him or towel without total meltdown over his ah baff kid loves to bathe bath my daughter goes nuts if she hears it and then does get bath the other day on the phone to my mum she was asking me to do something and said yeah after the kids have their bath miss was obviously listening and was waiting at the bathroom door when got off the phone not bad at all you have smart kid we spell things out too but my year old caught on to that one quick hey dad know how to spell out heard you say to cortney we re going to go later is it later yet deleted milk cracker cereal bar outside ball blanket anytime we say no she has thing for food and being outside my kid does seem to have any but there child nursery in our church daycare who has to be distracted as other people pick up their children because every time she heard the word bye she thinks it means she has to go somewhere ughhhhhh my son was mad afterwards did make copy of it on my car hard drive told him since it was my cd could do that we can not say the following around our almost year old we have to do the spell out poop pull up surprise mcdonalds adventure time there are more those are the major ones right now
